# ArrayFn

Kind: global class
Field: 2021/01/13

  • ArrayFn
    • new ArrayFn()
    • .sort(arr, type) ⇒ Array
    • .unique(arr) ⇒ Array
    • .union(a, b) ⇒ Array
    • .intersect(a, b) ⇒ Array
    • .remove(arr, ele) ⇒ Array
    • .formArray(ary) ⇒ Array
    • .max(ary) ⇒ number
    • .min(ary) ⇒ number
    • .sum(ary) ⇒ number
    • .average(ary) ⇒ Array

# new ArrayFn()

作用：数组扩展方法

# arrayFn.sort(arr, type) ⇒ Array

作用：数组排序方法

Kind: instance method of ArrayFn

Param Type Default Description
arr Array 数组
type number 1 1：从小到大 2：从大到小 3：随机

# arrayFn.unique(arr) ⇒ Array

作用：数组去重方法

Kind: instance method of ArrayFn

Param Type Description
arr Array 数组

# arrayFn.union(a, b) ⇒ Array

作用：求两个集合的并集

Kind: instance method of ArrayFn

Param Type Description
a Array 数组
b Array 数组

# arrayFn.intersect(a, b) ⇒ Array

作用：求两个集合的交集

Kind: instance method of ArrayFn

Param Type Description
a Array 数组
b Array 数组

# arrayFn.remove(arr, ele) ⇒ Array

作用：删除其元素的第一个

Kind: instance method of ArrayFn

Param Type Description
arr Array 数组
ele any 删除的元素

# arrayFn.formArray(ary) ⇒ Array

作用：将类数组转换为数组的方法

Kind: instance method of ArrayFn

Param Type Description
ary Array 数组

# arrayFn.max(ary) ⇒ number

作用：求数组最大值，仅适合数字数组

Kind: instance method of ArrayFn

Param Type Description
ary Array 数组

# arrayFn.min(ary) ⇒ number

作用：求数组最小值，仅适合数字数组, 否则返回NaN

Kind: instance method of ArrayFn

Param Type Description
ary Array 数组

# arrayFn.sum(ary) ⇒ number

作用：求数组和，仅适合数字数组, 否则返回NaN

Kind: instance method of ArrayFn

Param Type Description
ary Array 数组

# arrayFn.average(ary) ⇒ Array

作用：求数组和平均值，仅适合数字数组, 否则返回NaN

Kind: instance method of ArrayFn

Param Type Description
ary Array 数组

# DanmuService

Kind: global class
Field: 2021/01/13

  • DanmuService
    • new DanmuService(el, data, option)
    • .on(envet, fn)
    • .appendData(newdatas)

# new DanmuService(el, data, option)

作用：弹幕/走马灯服务

Param Type Description
el HTMLElement 元素节点
data Array 弹幕数据
option object maxSpeed {number} 最大速度, minSpeed {number} 最小速度, spaceRatio {number} 弹幕行走曲率半径, danmakuLength {number} 同时行走的弹幕数量

Example

<section ref="danmaku" class="Danmaku"></section>

mounted() {
 setTimeout(() => {
   this.$nextTick(() => {
    let danmakuData = [].concat(this.danmakuData);
   console.log('danmakuData>>>', danmakuData);
     this.danmaku = new Danmaku(this.$refs.danmaku, danmakuData, {
        maxSpeed: 10,
        minSpeed: 5,
        spaceRatio: 0,
        danmakuLength: 1
      });
      this.danmaku.on("nodata", () => {
        this.danmaku.appendData([].concat(this.danmakuData));
      });
    })
  }, 3000)
}

# danmuService.on(envet, fn)

作用：监听事件

Kind: instance method of DanmuService

Param Type Description
envet string 事件
fn function 函数

# danmuService.appendData(newdatas)

作用：往后推入弹幕数据

Kind: instance method of DanmuService

Param Type Description
newdatas Array 弹幕数据

# ImageService

Kind: global class
Field: 2021/01/13

  • ImageService
    • new ImageService()
    • .getRemotePic(url, imgClass, type) ⇒ Promise
    • .isSupportWebp() ⇒ boolean
    • .getWebpImage(url, config) ⇒ string

# new ImageService()

作用：图片处理服务

# imageService.getRemotePic(url, imgClass, type) ⇒ Promise

作用：获取远程图片，解决例如html2canvas中跨域的问题

Kind: instance method of ImageService

Param Type Description
url string 远程图片的链接
imgClass string 获取到图片展示的样式
type 'base64' | 'img' 决定返回值是url还是base64

Example

const { ImageService } = window['jrfe-utils'];
const imageService = new ImageService();
const getAvatar = async () => {
 const avatarUrl =
 'https://joyrun-activity-upyun.thejoyrun.com/huodong/2020/09/run-challenge/assets/img/share.jpg',
  res1 = await imageService.getRemotePic(avatarUrl, 'avatar', 'base64'),
  res2 = await imageService.getRemotePic(avatarUrl, 'avatar', 'img')
  console.log('avatar>>>', res1, res2); 
  document.body.appendChild(res2)
}
1

# imageService.isSupportWebp() ⇒ boolean

作用：判断是否支持webp格式

Kind: instance method of ImageService
Example

const supportWebp = imageService.isSupportWebp(); // true or false
1

# imageService.getWebpImage(url, config) ⇒ string

作用：将又拍云图片改成webp格式

Kind: instance method of ImageService

Param Type Description
url string 图片又拍云地址
config object 配置 详情见 https://help.upyun.com/knowledge-base/image/

Example

getWebpImage(url, {
  fw: 600
})
1

# Mime

Kind: global class
Field: 2021/01/16

  • Mime
    • new Mime()
    • .lookup(url)

# new Mime()

作用：媒体类型的处理

# mime.lookup(url)

作用：媒体类型的判断

Kind: instance method of Mime

Param Type Description
url string 图片的链接

Example

const shareUrl = 'https://joyrun-activity-upyun.thejoyrun.com/huodong/2020/09/run-challenge/assets/img/share.jpg'
const mimeInstance = new Mime();
mimeInstance.lookup(shareUrl) // 'image/jpg'

# Os

Kind: global class
Field: 2021/01/15

  • Os
    • new Os()
    • .checkAppV1AndV2(v1, v2) ⇒ number
    • .checkAppVersionIsOK(basic, target) ⇒ boolean
    • .isSamsung(sUserAgent) ⇒ boolean
    • .isIPhone(sUserAgent) ⇒ boolean
    • .softwareUpdate(uaStr, window) ⇒ boolean
    • .getUrlHost(url) ⇒ string
    • .isCrossDomain(url, baseUrl) ⇒ boolean

# new Os()

作用：一些关于系统的处理

# os.checkAppV1AndV2(v1, v2) ⇒ number

作用：版本大小的判断

Kind: instance method of Os
Returns: number - -1 v1小于v2 | 1 v1大于v2 | 0 v1等于v2

Param Type
v1 number
v2 number

Example

checkAppV1AndV2('5.14.3', '5.15.0')
1

# os.checkAppVersionIsOK(basic, target) ⇒ boolean

作用：是否大于目标版本

Kind: instance method of Os

Param Type Description
basic string 目标版本
target string 拿来比较的版本

Example

checkAppVersionIsOK('5.14.3', '5.15.0')
1

# os.isSamsung(sUserAgent) ⇒ boolean

作用：判断是否是三星手机

Kind: instance method of Os
Returns: boolean - user agent

Param Type
sUserAgent string

Example

isSamsung(sUserAgent)
1

# os.isIPhone(sUserAgent) ⇒ boolean

作用：判断是否是苹果手机

Kind: instance method of Os
Returns: boolean - user agent

Param Type
sUserAgent string

Example

isIPhone(sUserAgent)
1

# os.softwareUpdate(uaStr, window) ⇒ boolean

作用：根据不同机型进行软件更新跳转

Kind: instance method of Os

Param Type Description
uaStr string user agent
window window window对象

Example

if (softwareUpdate()) {
 softwareUpdate()
} else {
 Toast('当前手机不支持，请至应用市场更新');
}
1
2
3
4
5

# os.getUrlHost(url) ⇒ string

作用：获取当前链接的域名

Kind: instance method of Os

Param Type Description
url string 链接

Example

const imgUrl = 'https://joyrun-activity-upyun.thejoyrun.com/huodong/2020/09/run-challenge/assets/img/share.jpg';
getUrlHost(imgUrl) // https://joyrun-activity-upyun.thejoyrun.com/
1
2

# os.isCrossDomain(url, baseUrl) ⇒ boolean

作用：判断当前资源是否跨域

Kind: instance method of Os

Param Type Description
url string 资源的链接
baseUrl string 带本页面域名的链接

Example

const imgUrl = 'https://joyrun-activity-upyun.thejoyrun.com/huodong/2020/09/run-challenge/assets/img/share.jpg';
      const baseUrl = 'https://joyrun-activity-upyun.thejoyrun.com/1111';
isCrossDomain(imgUrl, baseUrl)
1
2
3

# TimeFn

Kind: global class
Field: 2021/01/15

  • TimeFn
    • new TimeFn()
    • .getAge(date) ⇒ number

# new TimeFn()

作用：时间处理

# timeFn.getAge(date) ⇒ number

作用：获取年龄

Kind: instance method of TimeFn

Param Type Description
date string 1990/01/01 or 1990-01-01

Example

const timeFnInstance = new TimeFn(); 
timeFnInstance.getAge('1991-01-01') // 30
